function EP03_14()
    --.承-4【8月第1週】「力仕事は任せろーﾑｷﾑｷｯ」
    SaveData.Title = "力仕事は任せろーﾑｷﾑｷｯ"

    --//BU：男子部
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ After the girls' division had gone home, the members of the boys' division gathered in the boys' school building. ]])

    MSG([[ The purpose was to make some progress on the backstage team's projects, which were running behind due to some absences. ]])

    MSG([[ The plan was to secretly advance the work so the girls wouldn't have to overexert themselves. ]])
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0470.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "We've named it the 'Go Fairy Go Operation!'" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "I think that name is embarrassing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "It truly is embarrassing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "Embarrassing, indeed." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0471.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "T-That's terrible..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "I kinda like it... you know..." ]])

    MSG([[ Mainly, the tasks suited for the boys involved heavy work like processing wood. In the corner of the classroom, a large pile of wood had been moved from the gymnasium before sunset. ]])

    MSG([[ This wood was planned to be used for trees in the background and for the castle. For now, they would cut the wood according to pre-made blueprints and assemble as much as they could carry. ]])

    MSG([[ First, using a saw._r Saw, saw? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0472.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Huh? W-Where's the saw?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0052.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "D-Dang it!? I was so focused on moving the wood that I forgot!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0032.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "A-All the tools are still inside the school building..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "The school building is already locked. Seriously, I’ll ask the maid to buy some for us—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Are you idiots for forgetting the tools or what?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0473.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Huh? Was that voice just now...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：リラ（通常）、ヒユ（通常）、ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hey there, Minato-kun. GGY!" ]])

    MSG([[ Turning around, there stood Lira, Daria, and even Hiyu at the classroom entrance. ]])

    MSG([[ Why are they at the boys' division? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Here, take this<sprite="Emoji" name="note">. I borrowed some tools for your night work." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0474.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, thank you! Now we can get to work." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Don’t be so secretive. You can’t be sneaking around doing all this on your own." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0150.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Let us join in on the 'Go Fairy Go Operation,' too." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0475.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "P-Please stop using that operation name already." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、ヒユ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Are you okay with that, Miss Shinosaki? I thought you didn’t like boys..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0215.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyah!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu jumped and shook her shoulders when Ouga asked. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s right. Hiyu was supposed to strongly dislike boys. ]])

    MSG([[ It was unthinkable before that she’d come all the way to the boys’ school building. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0216.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I-I want to change." ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu spoke in a trembling voice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0217.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I don’t want to just be protected by Erika-nee-sama. I want to be a girl who can stand beside her as a proper ‘knight’!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0218.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "So I can’t be afraid of boys! At the Shirahari Festival, I’ll be the one who shines the most and earns the most praise from her!" ]])
    -- //CI：オウガと話すヒユ 064
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI064a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0188.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Hmph. A powerful rival has appeared." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0219.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyah!? You just laughed, you jerk! I won’t give Erika-nee-sama to some musclehead like you!~~~" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//BU：オウガ（笑顔）、ヒユ（焦り）、リラ（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,1000,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,800,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG015ba")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_POSITION(200,-1270,0)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_SCALE(201,150,150)
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,265)
    SET_CUTIN_07_XL(35, 60, 35, 500)
    RIR_PARTICLE_02(202, "BUL_RIR07ba", 265, 300)
    RIR_PARTICLE_01(250, 0, 0, 100, 150)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0299.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hiyu, shut up! Sit!" ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_07_01(500)
    RESET_RIR_PARTICLE(201, 250)

    --//SE：床に倒れる音（びたんっ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc019.wav")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,-200,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0220.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Fugya!? You’re ‘ordering’ me again!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0300.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Come on, let’s start working. I seriously hate lollygagging~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Led by Lira, we properly began working on processing the wood. ]])
    --//SE：ノコギリで木を切る音
PLAY_SE("SEc005.wav")
    --//SE：トンカチの音
PLAY_SE("SEc004.wav")

    MSG([[ Some placed wood on desks and cut it with saws, others nailed pieces placed on the floor. ]])

    MSG([[ Since Hiyu and Mask Senpai #3 were good at drawing, they started sketching outlines on the finished wood with pencils. ]])

    --//BU：リラ（通常）、１号（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA101aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0053.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Alright, I'll hold this spot steady, so please handle the nails." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0301.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Okay, here goes!" ]])
    --//SE：肉が潰れる音（ぶちゅっ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc038.wav")
WAIT(500)

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA101ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
    LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,20,20,600,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0054.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Fwoooaaah!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0302.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah, s-sorry! Are you okay?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA101ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0055.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "I-I'm fine... huff... huff... mistakes happen." ]])
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Now, this time I’m counting on you. Aim for the nail. Under no circumstances should you aim for my finger. Absolutely not." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0303.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "...Okay~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])
    --//SE：肉が潰れる音（ぶちゅっ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc038.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,10,10,100,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Fwooooah—<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：２号（通常）、ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0151.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Look here, Mask Senpai #2. This wood I cut out—I think it’s got quite the provocative shape. If I were to name it, I’d call it ‘Lady Mara.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "W-What a beautiful carving! At first glance, it looks like just that thing, but the primal emotions it stirs bring tears to my eyes!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "But it’s still immature, Lady Daria. Please look at my wooden statue depicting human folly, ‘Mishaguji-sama.’" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0152.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...B-Beautiful. At first glance, it appears to be an obscene symbol, but the primal emotions it evokes bring tears." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "The evaluation is a tie... Now, Minato!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0153.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I’d like you to judge which work is superior!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0476.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Neither will be used on stage this time, so I reject both. Please follow the instructions properly." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：３号（通常）、ヒユ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA301aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "A-Are you a pro!? My brush technique is nowhere near yours!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "Heh heh... anyone can get these skills if they've been forced to practice since they were kids... Your brush hold is wrong; let me help you." ]])

	LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyah!? Don't touch me!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA301ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
    LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,40,20,600,false)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0036.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "Cough!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0223.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Ah!? S-sorry!" ]])
    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0477.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...It suddenly got noisy, huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ While shaping the wood with a carving knife, I laughed quietly to myself. ]])

    MSG([[ It was as lively as recess. But it wasn’t unpleasant at all. ]])

    MSG([[ Rather, compared to when it was just the two of us at first, the boys' division had become brighter and livelier. I was happy about that. ]])

    MSG([[ Over the past few months, the situation around the boys’ division had been improving little by little. ]])

    MSG([[ If the joint play at the Shirahari Festival succeeds, things will surely get even better. I want to believe my judgment wasn’t wrong. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
    
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Minato. I haven’t formally thanked you yet." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga sat next to me, carving wood, speaking just loud enough for me to hear. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0190.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Thanks for calling Erika the other day. It really helped. I am sincerely grateful." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0478.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "N-No, I just called Erika. I didn’t do anything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0191.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "But she did her very best for me. Someone who gives their best for you is truly reassuring." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga stopped carving, watching everyone working with a satisfied smile. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0192.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "...Minato. My father died alone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0479.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Alone, you say?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Yes. No one helped him, so he couldn’t trust anyone. He carried all tasks alone until he collapsed from overwork." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "And the Rokujou Group’s performance began to decline sharply. My mother often lamented it was due to his one-man management. ‘He should have trusted me more,’ she said." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "But my mother never truly fulfilled her duty to father. She left housework to the maid and financial management to him. No wonder he didn’t trust her; she was a ruthless woman." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0480.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "T-That’s awful... poor father." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0196.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Yes, even as a child, I thought so. After mother took over management, watching the business worsen was unbearable." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0197.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "That’s why since childhood I worked hard to quickly claim the successor seat my father prepared—to take power away from mother and succeed him." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "...I thought loneliness like my father’s was fine. I decided I would fight alone and volunteered to this academy for training." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0481.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "So that was the background." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I understood well Ouga’s strictness and the roots of his dislike of women. ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga wasn’t blindly confident in his own strength. He was trying not to trust anyone but himself. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0198.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "But reality is different. I made trustworthy friends and met respectable women. The world I thought absolute was actually very narrow." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0482.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Same here." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0483.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I also thought one person was my everything. I always centered my thoughts on that person and had no will of my own." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Change brings anxiety. But if you don’t change, you miss out on many realizations. ]])

    MSG([[ I had keenly felt this over the past few months. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0484.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I realized after coming to Yuriai Private Academy—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0485.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "The world is much wider and bigger than we think, and many encounters await us." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0199.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "I agree. But the longer you live in a narrow world, the harder it is to break free from it. You become afraid of change." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0200.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Uran Ryuguuin is the same. She fears change more than anyone else at this academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "If anyone can change Uran, it’s only Erika Ikusa. Tell her to save Uran." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0486.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Save Uran?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Ouga resumed working without saying more. It meant I had to investigate the rest myself. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran Ryuguuin. A daughter of the academy’s most prestigious family, called the ‘Princess Priestess,’ and a leader of the conservative faction. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0487.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (She fears change more than anyone else here, huh...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ For winning the Princess Election. For making the Shirahari Festival a success. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt I couldn’t move forward without understanding the difficulties Uran was facing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
